name: Calabrum
description:
Play as a medieval knight fighting against hordes of different kinds of robots in a giant forest. Use your abilities to defeat your foes and explore the world around you !

LET YOUR RAGE OUT !

You need an Xbox controller to play

Credits for the sound:

sounds effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/

music from https://tunetank.com/tracks/5526-unbroken/
